choices: Lua tries out a new super delux hover chair (lazyness weight gain)

1112.title: Technology

choices: he doesn't order one, but he gets chosen to beta test a newer model
11121.content: Lua sighed as he sat on the couch, watching tv. He had been feeling particularly lazy today to the point where he didn't even bother changing out of his pajamas. He flipped through channel after channel until he arrived at an infomercial. "Hey kids, do you hate doing work? Do you hate having to get up to do things? Would you rather sit around and do nothing like a lazy pig? Well now you can! Introducing the new Delux-a-chair 6000! It's got everything! Mechanical hands, a computer, a built in hd screen, games, a duel disk, and much much more! A fantastic piece of machinery like this would normally cost millions of dollars, but it can now be yours for a limited time for only $299.99!" Lua stared at the tv in shock, the chair looked awesome!
11121.title: The new Delux-a-chair 6000!

choices: Because it was. The robot was glitching out!
But it wasn't. The robot loved seeing Lua grow!
11122.content:
Lua was relaxing at home, happily snacking on food that his new chef created. However, this was no average robot chef, this chef was an android, who could cook quickly, and efficiently. Lua pats his big belly, gently rubbing and coddling it. He had gained plenty over the five months he's had her, at least 50 pounds. Lua smiled, turning over to the chef.

"Thanks for the birthday meal." Lua stated, as the chef whirred over to him, placing down a giant cake.

"Alright Lua, eat up!" The chef smiled, Lua looked at the cake, a little uneasy

"Oh...uh..." Lua gulps, "I'm...really full, still."

"Oh nonsense dear~" The chef grabs a cake slice and shoves it into Lua's mouth. Lua lets out a meep, as the chef, who looked just as old as he did, started feeding him. The chef giggled, Lua thought a screw as loose with his robot!
11122.title: Unwillingly Fattening

choices: Lua felt excited that he was starting to gain
Lua felt worried that his belly grew so quickly
Lua goes to get Luca to see what she thinks
1113.content:
Lua sighs as he relaxed on his couch, the boy had nothing to do. So, what did he do? He called a delivery pizza place, ordering the buffet pizzas. Lua grins once the pizzas arrive, tipping the deliverer, and starts going down on the food. Lua ate rather messily, getting pizza cheese and sauce onto his cheeks, and on his shirt. However, Lua didn't anticipate his belly growing as much as it did. His belly grew, the shirt he wore rose up, as Lua took off his jacket, the room warmed up in his mind. Lua kept eating, the pizza had been secretly spiked with spices, certain weight gain spices. Lua's belly hungrily growled once he finished, panting heavily, letting out a burp.

"How did I get so...hungry?" Lua noticed, however, ignoring his belly as he walks over to the fridge.

He licks his lips, grabbing brownies, cakes, ice cream, and stuffing himself even more. His belly kept on growing, slowly squishing onto the fridge. Eventually, Lua felt full, and quickly noticed his messy, full belly. Letting out a loud burp and a moan, he feels his tummy.
1113.title: Lua: The Great Devouring Glutton

115222.content: Here's something else that could happen to Leo...
115222.title: Something else

choices: Stay at home and visit the internet.
12.content:
The sun rose at the horizon in New Domino City and illuminated the entire city in a yellow luster. Most people were playing card games in their dreams or were still working in the security. However, a small green haired girl at the age of eleven was already on her feet and ready to do something. The girl was called Luna, a petite girl who did her hair in two high pigtails and was also pretty smart. Her twin brother, Leo, still slept in his bed.

She went to the bathroom to look at the only intact mirror in the entire house. The last one was smashed by Leo, who threw his shoe at it after he lost a duel against his sister.

She looked at the mirror and examined her entire body. She wore a red long-sleeved shirt under a short sleeved light pink jacket and a pair of white shorts that are held together by a red belt. She also wore high socks and a pair of pink sneakers. It was clear that she is dressed like a typical girl with all the red and pink colors. She also was very proud of her slim and slender body, because most of the girls in her class were slightly heavier and not all that attractive. She however managed that even grown-ups fell in love with her. But before she finished looking at the mirror, she gave herself a small slap on her butt for no apparent reasons.

However, Luna never thought what strange, exiting, weird or creepy things she would experience during that one single day.

“Okay, I am ready. What shall I do today? My brother is still asleep and I have the strange urge to do something for once,” she said to herself while running in circles. However, from one second to another, she decided to...
12.title: A new adventure.

choices: Sandwich (instant age progression and/or muscle growth)
121.content:
"Maybe I should eat something", thought Luna as she heard her stomach growling. She hadn't eaten anything today.

She then walked to the kitchen and opened the freezer. Here, Luna's eyes glanced over three different types of dishes. One was a blueberry pie, the other one was a bit soup and the other one was just a sandwich.

She reached her hand towards the dishes and chose...
121.title: Go to the kitchen.

choices: Take the Duel Disk and rev it up!
122.content:
Before the entire business with the Dark Signers, Luna was often very sick and even felt in a coma. But after she got her Ancient Fairy Dragon back, her condition changed drastically and she became a very healthy girl.

“Perhaps I should simply go outside. The weather also seems to be quite warm for this season and the sky is clear. But where should I go? I could go to the recently opened mall and look around for something that may interest me. Maybe I should pay Yusei and Crow a visit? Or should I take my Duel Disk with me and find someone to play against me in the park?” she thought while going downstairs to the living room.

She then sat at the couch and starred to the blue sky for a few minutes while moving up and down her legs. Suddenly, she jumped off the couch, landed on her feet and shouted: “I know where I go!”
122.title: Discovering Domino City

choices: Luna began to chat with the man
Luna was sorry because she has no time for this
1223.content:
“The new mall sounds kind of cool,” said the green haired girl to herself.

Luna then took the elevator, exited the building and walked towards her new destination. A foot walk was only twenty minutes long and would not be all that complicated. She only needed to go straight forward and after a green card shop; she must only go to the right to see the gigantic mall.

The pathway to the card shop was not exiting enough to stop her from her track. Only a few people crossed the street and the only shop she saw was an expensive grocery store she rarely visited. There was a park on the right with some beautiful flowers, but Luna chose that she would pay them a visit after she discovered the rich amount of shops inside the shopping precinct.

After fifteen minutes, she saw the green card shop that sells various products like Duel Disks, Cards or even Toys.

“I think I will visit the store at first. Perhaps I can find a nice card for Leo’s Deck. Maybe they have some cards that would complement with my Deck?” assumed Luna as she looked with big eyes at the card shop.

She wanted to take a closer look at the shop window, but before she could move on, an old and kind man appeared from the left out of the shadows and began to talk with the green haired girl in a strange accent:

“Hello my little angel! How are you?”
“Fine, I guess,” answered Luna quickly.
“You know. I was always able to sense a person’s heart by talking to them. And you seem to be a very kind person. Do you have some time to chat with an old grandpa?”

She now had the choice to go to the card shop or hear the stories of the old man. Her parents taught her to respect old people, but it was also suspicious that a stranger would talk to her. Why would he do that? Is he an enemy or simply a kind person?
1223.title: The journey to the mall

12231.content:
“Well, I have some time to pass,” told Luna the old man.
“You are a good kid,” said the old man while petting her hair. She blushed red. “Most kids today are unfriendly and have no respect towards old people. One of my childhood friends got beaten up by some teenagers last week and now he is in the hospital. Kids these days are so unfriendly! Back in my time, the police and our parents kicked the crap out of…”

The old man told her his entire childhood and how childish the current society is. After twenty minutes of nonstop blabbering, the old man stopped talking and looked directly at her yellow eyes.

“You have wonderful eyes.”
“Thanks a lot,” she began blushing even stronger.
“You are also very polite. You know, I and my wife are working on a new shop and we have the cheapest prices out here. Do you want to come and pay a visit?” asked the man.
“Sure! I originally wanted to go to the shopping mall, but I have plenty of time.”
“Thanks darling,” he said and pointed at an empty and abandoned site street that seemed to be dark due to all the skyscrapers around it. “Go to the dark side way and go to another side way that is behind a van. Find a red door and you are there.”
“Why would you even open a shop in such a dark place that is easy to miss?”
“It was quite cheap to earn a license. I was going to place some signs here for advertising, but I did not have enough time for this.”
“That would be indeed a good idea. Well, see you later!” answered Luna before she shook hands with him.

After the talk, the brave girl entered the dark side street. In fact, it was so dark that after Luna walked a few meters into the darkness, the people outside would not even see her anymore.
The smell of the garbage bins was also disgusting. In the side way, she needed to enter another side way that was well hidden well behind another garbage container and a van. This side way was even darker than the last one and none of the sky scrapers that surrounded the street had any windows.

“Why would anybody even open a shop right there? Nobody would even dare to enter a smelly and dark side way, especially if it’s hidden by a van,” she thought and doubted the entire story of the old men. And yet she still felt a great urge for adventure and continued walking further.

She then saw a red door. She reached the door, opened it and found…
12231.title: Luna began to chat with the man

choices: In the middle of a Forest.
In a Prison, while being chained on a chair.
122311.content:
There was nothing in that room! The light was weak and did not enlighten the entire room. She decided to advance even further to the next room, but she also was unable to find anything that looked like a shop. The whole air was as cold as the winter and they were also many burned down furniture. The ground was filled with dust and they seemed to be even some skeletons from smaller animals such as rats. She was scarred. She never was that scarred in her entire life! Perhaps it was a trap? Whatever it is, she had a bad feeling in here.

She stepped back from the room to go outside, but the path was blocked by something. Luna then rotated and saw the old man from outside and two unknown men. The old man had an evil grin on his face and the two men around him do not even care about her. She tried to duck and run between their legs, but one of the men grabbed her by her hand while the other one then tightly hold her legs together. She also tried to scream for help, but the old man quickly taped her mouth with duct tape.

“You are so naive! Haven’t you parents told you that you should not listen to strangers? You may be kind and smart, but you are way too gullible for this world!” said the old man to Luna, whom trembled in fear and tried to escape from them. But it was a waste. She was way too fragile to escape from the hands of two muscular men. The old man only moved his finger gently around her clothed belly, trying to locate her belly button.

She thought what would happen to her now. Would they rape or even kill her? Or kidnap her and use her as a guinea pig for horrible experiments? Whatever it is, she wished that Yusei or somebody else would appear and rescue her.
Luna still trembled in fear and tried to escape from the grip of the two men, but it was a futile attempt. The old man then took a bottle of chloroform and a tissue, damped the tissue with chloroform and held it on Luna’s nose. At first she still tried to resist, but from second to second, she became weaker and after a short time, she felt into a coma.

Without any voice, the three men then began to store Luna inside the van and drove away from New Domino City without being conspicuous.

Three hours later, the effect of the chloroform went away and Luna began to close the eyes. Where is she now?
122311.title: A trap!

1223112.content:
Luna then woke up, only to find herself in a prison. It was cold and hollow. She then tried to move, but the chains hugged her to a chair of sorts. Grief and fear are all that can fill Luna's mind.

She then glanced upwards to find a ray gun. Luna was worried.

The old man from earlier appeared from a window, then pressed a button, causing the ray gun to zap Luna.

What happens to her now?
1223112.title: In a Prison, while being chained on a chair.

12231121.content: What does she transform into?
12231121.title: She transforms.

122311211.content:
After the ray gun zapped Luna, she felt weird.

She felt her body thicken, and thicken, until it was like a boy of her age. Meaning that her chest was flattened.

She then felt something squirm from between her legs, like a fat worm digging out of the soil.

Luna then coughs as an Adam's Apple grows in her throat, giving her a voice of a boy.

Last thing to change was her hair. Her pigtails vanished and became a bit scruffy.

Now what happens to her?
122311211.title: A boy.

1223112111.content: What will her clothes resemble?
1223112111.title: Her clothes change

12231121111.content:
She then looks at her clothing and to her horror, it was changing!

Her sneakers became a pair of classic black, polished shoes, her shorts became a pair of fancy black pants, her panties became a pair of boy's briefs and her jacket and shirt became a butler's suit.

The only thing that hasn't changed was her, or rather, his hair.

Now what happens to her?
12231121111.title: A butler's.

122311211111.content:
The old man then walked up to her, holding a pendulum.

"Now, my "butler", you are under my power." The old man said.

Luna tried to look away, but her eyes gazed on the pendulum.

"I am under your power" Luna repeted/

"You have always been my butler" The old man said.

"I have always been your butler..." Luna repeated.

"You have forgotten everything about your past life" The old man said.

"I have forgotten everything about my past life..." Luna repeated. Her memories of being a sister to Leo and as one of the signers were disappearing, as new memories of being the old man's butler took their place.

"Your new name is Lucius." The old man said.

"My new name is Lucius" Luna, or rather Lucius repeated.

"Perfect." Said the old man. Now, when I snap my fingers, you will come to."

"Yes, sir." Lucius answered.

The old man snapped his fingers, then Lucius was out of his trance. He has forgotten everything about his past life. Being a Signer, being a sister to that boy, Leo and, of course, being a girl.

Now, Lucius, care to go back to your duties?

Yes master. Lucius replied.
122311211111.title: Her memories alter.

123.content:
“I was not at the Internet for a long time”, she said to herself.

The only PC in her apartment was located in a small room right under her bedroom. Luna then exited the bathroom and walked downstairs to the living room. From the stairs, she turned to the left and was walking until she arrived at the already opened door in the end of the corridor.

Her parents were quite rich and could easily afford such a big apartment, but they were always working oversea and were never at home. However, both Luna and Leo quickly got used to this situation.

The black PC was standing on a matching black desk. But Luna already took notice that the PC was turned on: “Huh, why is this PC already turned on? Has Leo forgotten to turn it off after he played that one game?”

But she did not really care about it right now. She sat on the chair and immediately checked her e-mails. There were three or four advertisements about the newest cards. However, the only thing that got her attention was a mail with the title ‘Want to transform?’

Luna then clicked the link out of curiosity. She was actually prepared to read another spam with some questionable pictures, but then she began to read the text:

“Hello Luna. From all the girls in this world, you were chosen to participate in an experiment. As the title suggests, you have now the chance to turn into an object until midnight. If you always wanted to experience the helplessness and the thrill to become an immobilized object, click the link under that paragraph.”

Luna was quite shocked. On the one side, she always wanted to experience something different, because the normal life was quite boring lately and to transform into an object would be a nice change. Maybe the weird, forced and painful feeling during the transformation would be a unique experience. On the other hand, the whole story seemed to sound like a big fat lie. It also was quite fishy that a stranger knew her name.

Her heart seemed to beat faster than regular and she then began to think: "I never received such a suspicious mail. How in the hell did they have my name and why was I chosen as a guinea pig? And who knows how dangerous this transformation really is? Perhaps this entire mail was a fake? I am sorry, but that is sounding too dangerous. But on the other hand, transforming into an object for a limited time would also be pretty interesting for once. Who knows how it feels to be an object? Well, I made a decision!"
123.title: A suspicious mail

1231.content:
Luna’s eagerness actually managed to win against her doubt and she decided to click the link.

“Ah, who cares? It will most likely be a fake. But I still hope it is true. I am still a little bit worried on how this works, but it's better than nothing!"

The page had a black background and the entire text was in white. She started to read the text and was surprised that the first paragraph described her entire biography of her life and the struggle she had before she clicked on that link. Having a twin, being a Signer, wanting to experience the transformation, the faster heart beat, her doubt; anything was mentioned here. She instantly lost all her doubts.

The second paragraph described that if she would move to the next page, the time would halt until she has fully transformed into an object of her choice. The reason was that nobody should stress her during the entire transformation sequence so that she could transform in all peace. However, she always could turn off the PC to let the time flow again.

Luna then advanced to the next page and instantly looked at the window. The Internet page was right! The entire city stood still. The clouds, the cars and the people on the streets were standing still. But before she continued with the process, she quickly wrote a note and placed it at her bed in their bedroom, saying that she would stay home until midnight and that Leo would not be worried about it. She then took a look at her sleeping twin brother and even he stood still.

Luna decided to poke her brother awake: ‘No reaction. So it is true!’

She then returned quickly to the PC.

The next paragraph described the next step. In order to begin the transformation, Luna must watch for five minutes at her monitor. If she succeeds with that, she must choose an object and during a time span of fifteen minutes, she would slowly transform into the object of choice. After that, the flow of time would continue and at midnight, she would revert back into her original form.

Luna however got another great idea: "Wait, as long as I keep my PC turned on, the time remains frozen and I can do anything what I ever wanted to do! Or should I stick with the transformation? Maybe exploiting the time stop would have serious consequences?"

Luna chose to...
1231.title: Time Stop

info.brief_description: make different things happen to the twins of yugioh 5ds
info.description:
Make the twins of yugioh 5ds go through different kinds of events.

WG, Inflation and transformation are allowed.

No adult stuff at ALL. Not that anyone would ever want to put that in here but its just so everyone knows.

No other characters can gain weight, inflate, or transform. Leo and Luna are the only ones allowed.

No GT/GTS in this interactive

Please add to this descriptively and explain how Leo and Luna go through an event.
for weight gain do not add something like(leo/luna gained 1000 pounds).

Have fun.
